hero.title: Life-Simplifying
hero.subtitle: We combine technology and aesthetics. Meet our secure, fast, and user-friendly applications.

wordify.desc: An interactive mobile app that makes learning English vocabulary fun. Improve your vocabulary with personalized tests and smart repetition system.

quitify.desc: Your faithful companion on your journey to quit smoking. Track your health improvements, see the money you save, and stay motivated.

salongo.desc: All-in-one management platform for beauty salons and hairdressers. Appointment tracking, cash management, and customer relations made easy.

stocky.desc: Comprehensive inventory and stock tracking solution for your business. Product, customer, supplier management and detailed transaction records in one app.

security.title: Security is Our Priority
security.desc: User data security is our top priority in all our applications. We protect your data using modern encryption techniques and security protocols.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.desc: Our applications fully comply with international data protection regulations such as KVKK (Turkey), GDPR (European Union), and CCPA (USA).

rights.title: User Rights
rights.desc: You can easily exercise your rights to access, rectify, and delete your data. Your requests are carefully evaluated within 30 days.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: Do you have questions about our privacy policies or applications? You can contact us directly.
contact.note: Please mention the relevant application in the subject line.
